name: Stack-a-Chicka
description:
Controls:   Space bar is jump which is also used to drop a new chicka.

Arrow keys can also be used to move the camera around to see the stack built, you can wait and the camera will re-snap to focus on the current height.

Stack -a-Chicka is my first fully published game. A very simple stacking game inspired by the idea of Flappy Bird as a way to learn and further my game development skill set.

A Chicka is a  cute  cousin of Elephants.   

Dedicated to my  wife and daughter.
